title: Sion is the clunkiest champ I've ever seen
body:
Walks slow.  Attacks slow.  Q is slow, E is basically useless in team fights away from enemy minions, R is super clunky.  Everything about Sion looks cool.  In a video.  Then you play him and realize Riot wrecked your favorite champion.

He's a tank?  Why?  He has no defensive steroid.  His W "free" HP comes at the cost of losing 700 base HP first, Wow nice thanks Riot.

delete R delete passive delete Q, buff W to 0.9 AP buff E to 0.9 AP and make it a line skill shot without needing minions, then maybe ill play Sion again.  I would rather have 2 useful skills over 4 useless ones.

Oh and hes way too big.  I doubt a Sion will dodge a skillshot ever.

this fellow is quite knowledgeable on all matters league related, particularly matters concerning sion

i am in no way acquainted with him and am offering this as an unbiased opinion

> i am in no way acquainted with him and am offering this as an unbiased opinion

i think i should listen to OP I could learn a thing or two.
Learn how to play him. He is fine. The q does take getting used too I'll admit, but other than that, these complaints are unwarranted.
You know who's actually super clunky? Cho'gath.
And did you know Sion self-stuns himself after his Q?  You can't quickly double-tap Q then immediately E, there's a nice delay just to make absolutely sure you know you're playing a clunky champion.

Unfortunately, I was worried this was just how he was gonna turn out after looking at his ability previews, and later his spotlight.
Q can't hit, and ult can't hit unless maybe, the whole enemy team is bunched around mid.

I know only a day has gone by and people may not know how to use him well, but I seriously doubt he'll be picked in ranked again when all is said done, UNLESS he gets a lot of minor buffs to his abilities and base stats.
#Stoppable Onslaught
